```{r}
biSubset <- fread("biSubset.csv")
```

```{r}
req_n <- 100000

k_10_dist <- function()
frechet_vec <- NULL
while (length(frechet_vec) < req_n){
  rf_base <- rfrechet(100000, -1, 1, 2.5)
  mask <- (rf_base <= 1) & (rf_base >= 0)
  rf_masked <- rf_base[mask]
  frechet_vec <- c(frechet_vec, rf_masked)
}

frechet_vec <- frechet_vec[1:req_n]
length(frechet_vec)
plot(density(frechet_vec))
```


```{r}
plot(density(biSubset$K_10))
```

```{r}
uf <- dfrechet(u, 0, 0.6, 0.8)
plot(density(log10(biSubset$K_10)))
lines(log10(u), uf, col="red")
```

```{r}
u <- sort(runif(10000, 0, 1))
csq <- dskt(u, df=.01, gamma=4)
plot(density(biSubset$K_10))
plot(density(csq))
```
